item.title: 36 Amazing Python Open Source Projects (v.2019)
item.description: 36 Amazing Python Open Source Projects (v.2019) [ read more ] For the past year, we’ve compared nearly 5,000 open source Python projects and selected the top 36. 6 min read NLP Guide: Identifying Part of Speech Tags using Conditional Random Fields [ read more ] POS tagging is the process of marking up a word in a corpus to a corresponding part of speech tag, based on… 6 min read
